thread.title: John Vasey
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by John Vasey

author: John Vasey
title: John Vasey
text:
Great customer service from Wes our Salesman to Carlo's, the Delivery Crew.
I would recommend Gardner White to anyone looking for good quality all around.
The delivery app is awesome, it allows you to continue your day as usual with an estimated time until it's your turn. It was very nice to be able to track what stop they were at and how many more until your turn. Great feature!
